A [hundret](ğ“…±) words hint at the existence of a dangling 'n' in the letter ğ“…± (think french plural -ons).  
If one accepts this, at least as [axiom](Axioms), you get the reading:  

[ğ“ƒŸ](ğ“ƒŸ) Shu+w [ğ“†„](ğ“†„)[ğ“…±](ğ“…±)[ğ“ƒŸ](ğ“ƒŸ) sow, full reading:  
[ğ“ƒŸ](ğ“ƒŸ) Shu+wn [ğ“†„](ğ“†„)[ğ“…±](ğ“…±)[ğ“ƒŸ](ğ“ƒŸ) swine  
[ğ“†·](ğ“†·) swamp â‡” swines ğ“†·ğ“„¿[ğ“‚¸](ğ“‚¸)[ğ“ƒŸ](ğ“ƒŸ)  sphaines â‡” ğ“‚¸ Span Ferkel
